Dev. Class A

Welcome to Dev. Class A, where the future is created.

Purpose

Our goal at Dev. Class A is to give any individual the opportunity to break into tech. We provide our students with in-demand software developement skills at no charge until they graduate and find a job.

Our Community

Our community provides emotional and professional support. We provide great resource, workships, and project builder. Students have the opportunity to extend their net work by interacting with each other, alumni and professionals working with our partners.

Our Partners

We partnered with great companies from the industry to build a curicullum that prepare students with hight in-demand skills so that they will be job ready after the completion of the program. Our Partners include Google, Hullu, Zillow, and CitiBank.

Our curriculum covers the following topics:

Front-End Development

This first section of the program teach students the three primary coding languages to code a website and web app designs.Those 3 languages are HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Back-End Development

Back-end deals with things that happens behind the scene.In this section, students would learn three languages that help websites work properly: PHP, Ruby, Python.

Job Search

This section provides students support needed to build portfolios, polish their resumes, practicing for interviews, and connecting them to companies. Each student is assigned a career coach.
